comment._content: Here are related family members en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Carlos_Manuel_de_C%C3%A9spedes Carlos Manuel de Céspedes del Castillo (April 18, 1819 Bayamo, Oriente – February, 1874 San Lorenzo, Oriente) was a Cuban planter who freed his slaves and made the declaration of Cuban independence in 1868 which started the Ten Years' War ==== Carlos Manuel de Céspedes y Quesada (August 12 1871, New York City, New York, United States – March 28 1939, Vedado, Havana, Cuba) was a Cuban writer, politician, diplomat, and President of Cuba. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Carlos_Manuel_de_C%C3%A9spedes_y_Qu...
